mapper.select: SELECT Count(m.meterid) FROM ha_meter m,ha_area a WHERE m.areaid=a.areaid

SELECT Count(m.meterid) FROM ha_meter m,ha_area a WHERE (m.state NOT IN ('正常','正确','关阀','建档','集中器无返回','采集器无返回','修改','已更正','已更换','失联') AND m.state NOT LIKE '%用量异常%' AND m.meterNumber >0) AND m.areaid=a.areaid
SELECT Count(m.meterid) FROM ha_meter m,ha_area a WHERE m.state='失联' AND m.meterNumber >0 AND m.areaid=a.areaid

SELECT Count(t.id) FROM (SELECT cu.custid AS id FROM ((ha_custom cu LEFT JOIN ha_room r ON cu.custid=r.custid) LEFT JOIN ha_building b ON r.buildingid=b.buildingid) LEFT JOIN ha_area a ON a.areaid=b.areaid GROUP BY cu.custid) t
SELECT Count(ce.id) FROM ha_centor ce WHERE Left(ce.description, 3)='KT3'
SELECT Count(ce.id) FROM ha_centor ce WHERE Left(ce.description, 3)='KT4'
SELECT Count(co.collectorid) FROM ha_centor ce,ha_collector co WHERE ce.id=co.centorid AND Left(ce.description, 3)='KT4'
SELECT Count(m.meterid) AS 总数 FROM ha_meter m,ha_area a WHERE m.areaid=a.areaid AND (position('正常' in m.state)>0 OR position('正确' in m.state)>0 OR m.state='关阀')
SELECT Count(m.meterid) AS 总数 FROM ha_meter m,ha_area a WHERE m.areaid=a.areaid AND m.state LIKE '异常%'
SELECT Count(m.meterid) AS 总数 FROM ha_meter m,ha_area a WHERE m.areaid=a.areaid AND m.state LIKE '%无返回%'
SELECT Count(m.meterid) AS 总数 FROM ha_meter m,ha_area a WHERE m.areaid=a.areaid AND m.state LIKE '%用量异常%'

SELECT Count(m.meterid) AS 总数 FROM ha_meter m,ha_area a WHERE m.areaid=a.areaid AND (position('正常' in m.state)>0 OR position('正确' in m.state)>0 OR position('光通道干扰' in m.state)>0 OR position('强光干扰' in m.state)>0 OR position('气泡干扰' in m.state)>0 OR position('表具故障' in m.state)>0)

SELECT m.state AS 状态, Count(m.meterid) AS 总数 FROM ha_meter m,ha_area a WHERE m.areaid=a.areaid AND m.meterNumber>0 AND m.state NOT LIKE '%用量异常%' AND m.state NOT LIKE '%重号%' GROUP BY m.state ORDER BY m.state
SELECT ce.state AS 状态,Count(ce.id) AS 总数 FROM ha_centor ce WHERE (Left(ce.description,3)='KT4' OR Left(ce.description,3)='KT3') GROUP BY ce.state ORDER BY ce.state DESC
SELECT Count(co.collectorid) AS 总数 FROM ha_centor ce,ha_collector co WHERE ce.id=co.centorid AND co.state ~* '^[0-9]'
SELECT Count(co.collectorid) AS 总数 FROM ha_centor ce,ha_collector co WHERE ce.id=co.centorid AND co.state='EE'
